```{r}
source("http://thegrantlab.org/misc/cdc.R")
View(cdc)
head(cdc$height)
```

```{r}
tail(cdc$height)
```

```{r}
plot(cdc$height, cdc$weight)

plot(cdc[-c(1,2,3,4,7,8,9)])
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(cdc, aes(x=cdc$height, y=cdc$weight))+
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(cdc)+
  aes(height, weight)+
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
cor(cdc$height, cdc$weight)
```

```{r}
height_m <- cdc$height * 0.0254
weight_kg <- cdc$weight * 0.454
bmi <- weight_kg/(height_m^2)
```

```{r}
plot(cdc$height, bmi)
cor(cdc$height,bmi)
```
```{r}
sum(bmi >= 30)

```

```{r}
plot(cdc[1:100, "height"], cdc[1:100, "weight"])
```

```{r}
cdc$bmi <- weight_kg/(height_m^2)
table(cdc$gender[cdc$bmi>=30])
```

```{r}
table(cdc$gender, cdc$bmi>30)
```


```{r}
table(cdc$gender[subset(bmi,bmi>=30)])
```
